name: Stop The Clock (James Sonneveld)
description:
Time is out of hand. It's time to STOP THE CLOCK!

Use the S, H, and M keys to stop the hands of the clock on the right time.

This is a short little project that I've been working. By no means is this a fully functioning game. Some feedback is necessary before I attempt to go further with this project.

This project was also my first attempt at rigging a model. It may not be as complicated as humanoid rig but I'm happy about how it turned out.

Give it a try. Honest feedback is appreciated.
